Title: System Configuration
Description: Advanced system settings and database configuration.

Topics.Title: Database Settings
Topics.Content:
Database Configuration

Database connection settings are configured in the Settings panel.

Connection Parameters

  • Server Address: The MySQL server hostname or IP address.
  • Port: MySQL server port (default: 3306).
  • Database Name: The name of the WIP application database.

Note: Changing these settings requires administrative privileges. Contact your IT department if you need assistance.

Topics.Title: Application Logs
Topics.Content:
Application Logs

The application maintains detailed CSV logs of all operations and errors.

Log Location

Logs are stored in: %APPDATA%\MTM\Logs\

Viewing Logs

  1. Navigate to Menu > View > Application Logs.
  2. The log viewer displays recent log entries.
  3. Use filters to search for specific events or errors.

Log Types

  • Normal Logs: Standard application activity.
  • Error Logs: Exception and error information with stack traces.

Logs are automatically cleaned up after 30 days to save disk space.
